page.title: 10A DAY IN THE LIFE OF CILLA
page.content: I begin my day at 7 a.m. when I am woken by Mummy or Daddy.I get myself dressed then help my younger sisters.For breakfast I have Rice Krispies,then I get washed and clean my teeth. At 8.30 a.m. Mrs Swaney takes us to school in the car.It is a five minute journey.I play with my friends in the playground until school starts at 9 a.m. Our teacher calls the register first then we have assembly.After assembly we do mathematics until playtime then language work until lunch at 12 noon.We can join clubs at lunhtime to do science,library or gym. In the afternoons we do art, craft,needlework or physical activities until 2.45 p.m. then we go out to play until 3 p.m.School ends at 3.30 p.m. after storytime.
